basics.name: Your Name
basics.label: Principal Embedded Software Design Engineer (PhD)
basics.summary:
Systems-oriented engineer with a PhD in Information and Communication Technology and 18 years of combined academic and industry experience at the hardware–software boundary. I specialize in transforming complex, poorly understood systems into structured, validated, and testable designs.
My work spans novel low-power wireless protocol design (achieving order-of-magnitude energy efficiency improvements and “four nines” reliability under interference), model-driven hardware abstraction and API design, cross-layer debugging of analog–digital subsystems (PLL redesign enablement), infrastructure modernization (CMake-based build systems), automated verification frameworks, and formalization of release processes.
I consistently increase clarity, automation, observability, and reproducibility — reducing technical and organizational entropy while enabling scalable development. I am most effective in roles requiring deep systems thinking, architectural judgment, and rigorous experimentation across multidisciplinary teams.
